name: Hidden Mahjong - Cats Tropical Island Vacation
name_original: Hidden Mahjong - Cats Tropical Island Vacation
description:
Are you ready for the vacation of a lifetime?!

Sipping on Pina Coladas, relaxing in a hammock between two palm trees on the beach, and listening to the chatter from the closest tiki bar. It sounds like the perfect tropical island vacation and the majestic cats from Difference Games’ are taking over! From deep in the thick green rainforest to the edge of the sandy waves… the cats are having a great time on vacation, and it’s time for you to join them!

Match Mahjong cards to clear the board and reveal beautiful artwork of the cats’ favorite vacation spots. Upgrade every level to a more challenging board, unlock awesome collectable items, and more!

------ MAHJONG CATS TROPICAL ISLAND VACATION MAIN FEATURES -----

UNLOCK new levels, COLLECT amazing treasure, and SPIN prize wheels for bonus coins!
These awesome daily tasks are here to help you earn TONS of coins. Collect items and craft objects and sell them for gold! Match to collect items and unlock prizes in hidden treasure chests!

80 handcrafted backgrounds and 160 AMAZING levels including normal + expert!
Stay busy for hours as you navigate all of the Mahjong challenges and adventures! Take it slow with a normal level, or upgrade with coins to really challenge yourself. Replay for high scores and see how much you improve after every round of Mahjong. Earn three gold stars on every level and all of your friends will be calling you the Mahjong master!

DOWNLOAD ADORABLE CAT AND KITTEN PICTURES! of cats doing all sorts of silly things! See cats on vacation and just living their cute cuddly lives!


----- TRAVEL TO FOUR AMAZING TROPICAL VACATION DESTINATIONS! -----
Land 1 - Cats Island
WOW! There are so many furry cats and cuddly kittens on this Island our hearts may explode with joy! Each level is cuter than the last and the cats are having the time of their lives exploring a new land. Join them on their feline adventure and find yourself addicted to completing each Mahjong adventure level faster and faster - you know you want to!

Land 2 - Cats Feline Performers
After the Island party, the cats’ have decided to become circus performers instead of returning to their homes! Don’t we all think about this after the perfect vacation getaway? The cats are living out their dreams, they only have nine lives after all . Find some inspiration from these free cats as the dress up and pursue careers as stage performers, magicians, acrobats, and more!

Land 3 - Cat Sweet Life
After all that wild actions the cats are ready to head home and do what they do best, hang out around the house! The kittens and cats are relaxing with their families on the front porch, in the summer gardens, and all around the house. There’s no place like home!

Land 4 - The Cat Family
Awh! After winding down from their crazy adventures at home, the cats decide that it is time to start a family. Watch the mommy and daddy cat love on their sweet kittens and teach them all about life around the home. The human kids are just as cute as babies as the cuddle up and relax. What a sweet ending and new beginning to the crazy life of these cats!

Keep playing for future updates…

Land 5 - Where Are My Cats?
Well… where are they!?! Stay tuned for the next update to find out!

The fun doesn’t have to stop once you have mastered this game! Follow The Mahjong Adventure Series by Difference Games and travel around an unlimited number of fantasy worlds! Do you fancy majestic unicorns? What about someone who loves taking strolls through manicured gardens or the rustic countryside farmland? Difference Games’ Mahjong games feature all of these beautiful retreats and more. And the best part is: we’re always creating new and exciting FREE Mahjong games that pair fantastic game mechanics and top-level 3D professional artwork so that you know you’re always playing the best free Mahjong mobile game!
